006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.binding;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.PositiveIntegerAdapter;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.StringAdapter;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.adapter.TokenAdapter;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLine;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.MarkupLineAdapter;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IBoundObject;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IMetaschemaData;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.JsonGroupAsBehavior;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.constraint.IConstraint;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValue;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.AllowedValues;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundAssembly;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundField;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.BoundFlag;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.GroupAs;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.MetaschemaAssembly;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.annotations.ValueConstraints;
026
027import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ReflectionToStringBuilder;
028import org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.ToStringStyle;
029
030import java.math.BigInteger;
031import java.util.LinkedList;
032import java.util.List;
033
034@SuppressWarnings({
035    "PMD.DataClass",
036    "PMD.FieldNamingConventions"
037})
038@MetaschemaAssembly(
039    formalName = "Inline Flag Definition",
040    name = "inline-define-flag",
041    moduleClass = MetaschemaModelModule.class)
042public class InlineDefineFlag implements IBoundObject {
043  private final IMetaschemaData __metaschemaData;
044
045  @BoundFlag(
046      formalName = "Inline Flag Name",
047      name = "name",
048      required = true,
049      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class)
050  private String _name;
051
052  @BoundFlag(
053      formalName = "Inline Flag Binary Name",
054      name = "index",
055      typeAdapter = PositiveIntegerAdapter.class)
056  private BigInteger _index;
057
058  @BoundFlag(
059      formalName = "Deprecated Version",
060      name = "deprecated",
061      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
062  private String _deprecated;
063
064  @BoundFlag(
065      formalName = "Flag Value Data Type",
066      name = "as-type",
067      defaultValue = "string",
068      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
069      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
070          allowOthers = true,
071          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "base64",
072              description = "The [base64](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#base64) data type."),
073              @AllowedValue(value = "boolean",
074                  description = "The [boolean](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#boolean) data type."),
075              @AllowedValue(value = "date",
076                  description = "The [date](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date) data type."),
077              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time",
078                  description = "The [date-time](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-time) data type."),
079              @AllowedValue(value = "date-time-with-timezone",
080                  description = "The [date-time-with-timezone](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-time-with-timezone) data type."),
081              @AllowedValue(value = "date-with-timezone",
082                  description = "The [date-with-timezone](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#date-with-timezone) data type."),
083              @AllowedValue(value = "day-time-duration",
084                  description = "The [day-time-duration](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#day-time-duration) data type."),
085              @AllowedValue(value = "decimal",
086                  description = "The [decimal](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#decimal) data type."),
087              @AllowedValue(value = "email-address",
088                  description = "The [email-address](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#email-address) data type."),
089              @AllowedValue(value = "hostname",
090                  description = "The [hostname](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#hostname) data type."),
091              @AllowedValue(value = "integer",
092                  description = "The [integer](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#integer) data type."),
093              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v4-address",
094                  description = "The [ip-v4-address](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ip-v4-address) data type."),
095              @AllowedValue(value = "ip-v6-address",
096                  description = "The [ip-v6-address](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#ip-v6-address) data type."),
097              @AllowedValue(value = "non-negative-integer",
098                  description = "The [non-negative-integer](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#non-negative-integer) data type."),
099              @AllowedValue(value = "positive-integer",
100                  description = "The [positive-integer](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#positive-integer) data type."),
101              @AllowedValue(value = "string",
102                  description = "The [string](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#string) data type."),
103              @AllowedValue(value = "token",
104                  description = "The [token](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#token) data type."),
105              @AllowedValue(value = "uri",
106                  description = "The [uri](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uri) data type."),
107              @AllowedValue(value = "uri-reference",
108                  description = "The [uri-reference](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uri-reference) data type."),
109              @AllowedValue(value = "uuid",
110                  description = "The [uuid](https://pages.nist.gov/metaschema/specification/datatypes/#uuid) data type."),
111              @AllowedValue(value = "base64Binary",
112                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'base64' data type."),
113              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime",
114                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'date-time' data type."),
115              @AllowedValue(value = "dateTime-with-timezone",
116                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'date-time-with-timezone' data type."),
117              @AllowedValue(value = "email",
118                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'email-address' data type."),
119              @AllowedValue(value = "nonNegativeInteger",
120                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'non-negative-integer' data type."),
121              @AllowedValue(value = "positiveInteger",
122                  description = "An old name which is deprecated for use in favor of the 'positive-integer' data type.") })))
123  private String _asType;
124
125  @BoundFlag(
126      formalName = "Default Flag Value",
127      name = "default",
128      typeAdapter = StringAdapter.class)
129  private String _default;
130
131  @BoundFlag(
132      formalName = "Is Flag Required?",
133      name = "required",
134      defaultValue = "no",
135      typeAdapter = TokenAdapter.class,
136      valueConstraints = @ValueConstraints(allowedValues = @AllowedValues(level = IConstraint.Level.ERROR,
137          values = { @AllowedValue(value = "yes", description = "The flag is required."),
138              @AllowedValue(value = "no", description = "The flag is optional.") })))
139  private String _required;
140
141  @BoundField(
142      formalName = "Formal Name",
143      description = "A formal name for the data construct, to be presented in documentation.",
144      useName = "formal-name")
145  private String _formalName;
146
147  @BoundField(
148      formalName = "Description",
149      description = "A short description of the data construct's purpose, describing the constructs semantics.",
150      useName = "description",
151      typeAdapter = MarkupLineAdapter.class)
152  private MarkupLine _description;
153
154  @BoundAssembly(
155      formalName = "Property",
156      useName = "prop",
157      maxOccurs = -1,
158      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "props", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
159  private List<Property> _props;
160
161  @BoundAssembly(
162      useName = "constraint")
163  private FlagConstraints _constraint;
164
165  @BoundField(
166      formalName = "Remarks",
167      description = "Any explanatory or helpful information to be provided about the remarks parent.",
168      useName = "remarks")
169  private Remarks _remarks;
170
171  @BoundAssembly(
172      formalName = "Example",
173      useName = "example",
174      maxOccurs = -1,
175      groupAs = @GroupAs(name = "examples", inJson = JsonGroupAsBehavior.LIST))
176  private List<Example> _examples;
177
178  public InlineDefineFlag() {
179    this(null);
180  }
181
182  public InlineDefineFlag(IMetaschemaData data) {
183    this.__metaschemaData = data;
184  }
185
186  @Override
187  public IMetaschemaData getMetaschemaData() {
188    return __metaschemaData;
189  }
190
191  public String getName() {
192    return _name;
193  }
194
195  public void setName(String value) {
196    _name = value;
197  }
198
199  public BigInteger getIndex() {
200    return _index;
201  }
202
203  public void setIndex(BigInteger value) {
204    _index = value;
205  }
206
207  public String getDeprecated() {
208    return _deprecated;
209  }
210
211  public void setDeprecated(String value) {
212    _deprecated = value;
213  }
214
215  public String getAsType() {
216    return _asType;
217  }
218
219  public void setAsType(String value) {
220    _asType = value;
221  }
222
223  public String getDefault() {
224    return _default;
225  }
226
227  public void setDefault(String value) {
228    _default = value;
229  }
230
231  public String getRequired() {
232    return _required;
233  }
234
235  public void setRequired(String value) {
236    _required = value;
237  }
238
239  public String getFormalName() {
240    return _formalName;
241  }
242
243  public void setFormalName(String value) {
244    _formalName = value;
245  }
246
247  public MarkupLine getDescription() {
248    return _description;
249  }
250
251  public void setDescription(MarkupLine value) {
252    _description = value;
253  }
254
255  public List<Property> getProps() {
256    return _props;
257  }
258
259  public void setProps(List<Property> value) {
260    _props = value;
261  }
262
263  /**
264   * Add a new {@link Property} item to the underlying collection.
265   *
266   * @param item
267   *          the item to add
268   * @return {@code true}
269   */
270  public boolean addProp(Property item) {
271    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
272    if (_props == null) {
273      _props = new LinkedList<>();
274    }
275    return _props.add(value);
276  }
277
278  /**
279   * Remove the first matching {@link Property} item from the underlying
280   * collection.
281   *
282   * @param item
283   *          the item to remove
284   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
285   */
286  public boolean removeProp(Property item) {
287    Property value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
288    return _props != null && _props.remove(value);
289  }
290
291  public FlagConstraints getConstraint() {
292    return _constraint;
293  }
294
295  public void setConstraint(FlagConstraints value) {
296    _constraint = value;
297  }
298
299  public Remarks getRemarks() {
300    return _remarks;
301  }
302
303  public void setRemarks(Remarks value) {
304    _remarks = value;
305  }
306
307  public List<Example> getExamples() {
308    return _examples;
309  }
310
311  public void setExamples(List<Example> value) {
312    _examples = value;
313  }
314
315  /**
316   * Add a new {@link Example} item to the underlying collection.
317   *
318   * @param item
319   *          the item to add
320   * @return {@code true}
321   */
322  public boolean addExample(Example item) {
323    Example value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
324    if (_examples == null) {
325      _examples = new LinkedList<>();
326    }
327    return _examples.add(value);
328  }
329
330  /**
331   * Remove the first matching {@link Example} item from the underlying
332   * collection.
333   *
334   * @param item
335   *          the item to remove
336   * @return {@code true} if the item was removed or {@code false} otherwise
337   */
338  public boolean removeExample(Example item) {
339    Example value = ObjectUtils.requireNonNull(item, "item cannot be null");
340    return _examples != null && _examples.remove(value);
341  }
342
343  @Override
344  public String toString() {
345    return new ReflectionToStringBuilder(this, ToStringStyle.MULTI_LINE_STYLE).toString();
346  }
347}
